aws_acm_certificate.description: Requests and manages a certificate from Amazon Certificate Manager (ACM).

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

domain_validation_options.description: A list of attributes to feed into other resources to complete certificate validation. Can have more than one element, e.g. if SANs are defined. Only set if `DNS`-validation was used.

validation_emails.description: A list of addresses that received a validation E-Mail. Only set if `EMAIL`-validation was used.

resource_record_name.description: The name of the DNS record to create to validate the certificate

resource_record_type.description: The type of DNS record to create

resource_record_value.description: The value the DNS record needs to have
